snippet: The Museum of Contemporary Art ended weeks of intense speculation by confirming that Philippe Vergne, of the Dia Art Foundation, has been chosen as its new director to replace Jeffrey Deitch.
abstract: Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art has confirmed that Philippe Vergne, director of the Dia Art Foundation in New York, has been chosen as its new director.

byline.original: By JORI FINKEL and RANDY KENNEDY

lead_paragraph: The Museum of Contemporary Art ended weeks of intense speculation by confirming that Philippe Vergne, of the Dia Art Foundation, has been chosen as its new director to replace Jeffrey Deitch.

headline.seo: The Museum of Contemporary Art Picks Philippe Vergne, of the Dia Art Foundation
headline.main: Los Angeles Museum Names a New Director
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Museum Is Set to Name a New Director

keywords.value: Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art
keywords.name: organizations
